biotools.summary:
BastionHub is a universal  platform to integrate and analyze the five major types of substrates (i.e. from types I-IV and VI secretion systems) secreted by Gram-negative bacteria 

Secretion systems are one of the key “weapons” used by bacteria to unleash a repertoire of virulence factors into eukaryotic host cells or into neighboring bacterial cells to disrupt their normal cellular processes.
